prompts: Create a psychic-type Pokemon with a hypnotic gaze and a fluffy collar.
Design a Pokemon resembling a bipedal creature with yellow skin and large ears.
Show me a whimsical Pokemon that uses sleep-inducing abilities in battles.
Imagine a Pokemon that thrives in urban environments, often seen in alleys.
Generate a unique Pokemon that can manipulate dreams and has a comforting appearance.
Make a creature with a round face and a distinctively curled tail.
Give me a Pokemon that is known for its calming presence and psychic powers.
